tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to many dental clinic so far be it in my native Kolkata and also in Bangalore but I have never found this kind of doctor. I am not sure from where to start and where to end because coming to her behaviour to professionalism everything was super. She guided me well throughout the process of RCT, brushing technique and everything. I will recommend her to every patient who are staying nearby this area.
I'm very happy with the treatment. initially I scared but the way she treated is very impressive. I didn't feel any pain while treatment and after treatment as well
